channel.title: Glitchy Lip Animations
channel.description:
This is so weird. I've only started having this bug recently. ?( The lips of scientists do not animate properly. I've tried verifying the cache and redownloading the game.
This happens with all human NPCs, game-wide.
Here's the screenshot: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=521449443[/url]

item.title: Glitchy Lip Animations
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
Half an hour ago, the guard decked him something good.

Read full topic

This is so weird. I’ve only started having this bug recently. ?(
